headline: After Anti-Semitic Incidents, Some Are Rethinking State Bail Reform
abstract: Gov. Andrew Cuomo, a Democrat, has signaled that the law may need to be modified, setting up a battle with his party’s progressive wing.
lead_paragraph: ALBANY, N.Y. — In the week since New York officially ended cash bail for many nonviolent criminal defendants, concerns over a spate of anti-Semitic incidents and other recent alleged crimes committed by those released under the law have spurred calls to undo parts of the legislation.
